commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great job, everyone! The closing ceremony also went off without a hitch. We've got everyone to thank for getting through this without any major incidents! Thank you so much!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Why are you getting all formal on us? Be happy and let loose now that we've safely made it to the end!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's a shame that it's over, though!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm exhausted, but the fun I had totally beats all of that.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yup! My heart's still pounding. I might be too excited to get any sleep tonight. Do you mind if I sleep with you, Dia?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I suppose if you must. But just for tonight, okay?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Giggle* Thanks.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I had a really great, inspiring experience today. I think it helped me get an idea for a new song.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Me too. I gotta write down the music once I get home!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm looking forward to μ's' and Aqours' new songs. Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It wasn't easy getting here, but it all ended in a flash.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Time flies when you're having fun, right? It just goes to show how much fun we really had.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It was SO much fun! If it's always gonna be this fun, I wanna do it over and over again!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Now that we've experienced what it's like to run a large event, I've got the confidence to do a better job next time.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ooh! Someone sounds motivated!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Everyone! We have a situation!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Gosh, you scared me. Why are you all flustered?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: The audience is refusing to leave even after you all left the stage! Their cheers for an encore are overwhelming!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Whaaat?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Listen for yourself. You can hear them all the way down here.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Mehehe. Everyone yearns for me that badly, huh? I guess that's to be expected, though.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It is the duty of the fallen angel to grant the wishes of her little demons. I will answer your spirited cries!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I suppose we gotta give our fans what they want.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Wh-What should we sing?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It's gotta be TOKIMEKI Runners, don't you think?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: That's our only choice! All right! I'm gonna get out there full of energy!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Okay, let's go.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, wait!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hey, Shioriko? You should join us on stage. Sing along with us!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What?! Why would you spring such a suggestion on me like that?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I really do want to perform with you, Shioriko!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Uehara...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: D-Don't be ridiculous. Hurry up and get out there to see the fans.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm not being ridiculous. Come on, join us!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That is far easier said than done...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, come on! Shioko, join us!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah! Don't pull the, "I've forgotten all the practice I did with you all" card! That's not gonna fly with me!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She's right! And we were only able to pull off such a wonderful event today with your help, Shioriko! Let us introduce you to everyone!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You heard Emma. We couldn't possibly end the event without introducing everyone to the person who helped us out so much.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Uh-huh. If Ayumu didn't already suggest it, I would've asked you to join us, too.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I cannot do it! I-I'm only here to help manage the event. I'm not someone who should step out into the spotlight.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: The School Idol Festival encompasses everyone's dreams, and it's made possible by everyone involved. There's no difference between who's behind-the-scenes or on stage.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sure you remember the whole dance routine because you practiced it with us, right?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes, I do, but I...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You want to bring smiles to everyone's faces, don't you?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Then let's take to the stage together and make everyone smile!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: But I'm not suited to doing that.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's not about being suited to it or not, Shioriko!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What's important is whether you want to do it or not. If you have the desire to be a school idol, then lying to yourself will only cause you pain.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's what you taught me, right? So let's get out there together! Fulfill your desires and dreams together with us!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: But...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko. If you have even the faintest desire to perform with them, then get out there on the stage.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Try to tap into that feeling right now.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That feeling?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Sigh* I knew this already, but you all are being far too forceful.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, I must thank you. The feelings you and my sister have recognized within me... I will try to trust them.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I want to give it a shot! I want to stand on stage with everyone too!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Please let me join you!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's what I was waiting to hear from you!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Being a school idol is lots of fun, so you won't be able to quit once you get into it! You better be ready for that.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Whoa, hey now! Don't go trying to scare her from the get-go!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I see that Nijigasaki has gained yet another promising school idol.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I mean, I'm sure you're no match for me, though.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Really? She might catch up to you pretty quickly.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey! What are you saying?!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Ahahaha!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: All right! Let's go, Shioriko!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Okay!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: μ's? Are you all ready?

commands.speaker: μ's
commands.line: Absolutely!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm expecting an amazing performance from you, Aqours!

commands.speaker: Aqours
commands.line: Just wait and see!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nijigasaki, have a blast out there, all ten of you!

commands.speaker: Nijigasaki
commands.line: For sure!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone pitched in to make this School Idol Festival a reality, so enjoy every last second of it!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Adding in Shioriko makes this a 28-person performance. It's overflowing with a sparkle and excitement that I've never seen before.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Each and everyone one of the fans filling this packed venue is bursting with joy. I'm one of those fans who's become completely fixated on the performance myself.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: ("Come Together, Dream Together!" Different dreams have filled this place, just like our slogan proclaims. I'm glad we all share a belief in realizing the dreams of others.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I'm sure this vivid spectacle will continue to shine deep within my heart, forever.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Congratulations, everyone! You've really earned it! And also, thank you!)
